Interface IComponentHandle<C,L,A,M>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Injectable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IComponentView<C,L,A,M>
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    public interface IComponentHandle<C,L,A,M>
extends Injectable

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        C handle(IAction<A,M> action)
  throws java.lang.Exception
        Handles component when called. The handle method in sub components is always executed in a separate thread;
        Parameters:
        action - , the triggering action
        Returns:
        view component
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
